description.en: The main task of the course " European Union Green Deal" is to introduce the aim and main targets of the European Green Deal and related policies. In this course, main policy areas, motivation, and support mechanisms will be highlighted in addition to understanding the concept of climate neutrality and mechanisms of natural and possibly human-caused environmental changes. The main areas and possible activities in Estonia to support the Deal will be discussed. Future demand for technological natural resources and the basics of their economics will be highlighted.
description.et: Euroopa Liidu Roheleppe kursuse eesmärgiks on tutvustada Euroopa Liidu Roheleppe peamisi eesmärke, alavaldkondi ja eesmärkide elluviimist võimaldavat poliitikat. Kursuses käsitletakse Roheleppe toetavaid mehhanisme, kliimaneutraalsuse sisu ja saavutamise võimalusi ja keskkonnamuutustega seonduvaid looduslikke ja inimtekkelisi protsesse. Tutvustatakse Eesti võimalikku osa Roheleppes ning näidatakse põhilisi valdkondi, mis leppe täitmist puudutavad. Antakse ülevaade Roheleppega seonduvast loodusressursside võimalikust kasutamisvajadusest.

objectives.en: Overview about the European Green Deal, deal's contents and its targets, resource usage in order to support development's sustainability into green economy and climate neutrality.
objectives.et: Ülevaade EL Roheleppe sisust, Roheleppe valdkondadest ja valdkondlikest põhieesmärkidest, ressursside kasutamisest jätkusuutlikuse ja rohelise ülemineku ja kliimaneutraalsuse tagamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. knows the aim and content of the European Green Deal, policy areas, and targets
learning_outcomes.et: 1. teab Euroopa Liidu Roheleppe põhieesmärke, sisu, valdkondi ja nende alaeesmärke

learning_outcomes.en: 2. knows the trends of acquiring the main targets of the Deal
learning_outcomes.et: 2. tunneb põhilisi arengutrende strateegia eesmärkide saavutamiseks

learning_outcomes.en: 3. knows the supporting policies and mechanisms of the Deal
learning_outcomes.et: 3. tunneb Roheleppe toetavaid mehhanisme ja strateegiaid

learning_outcomes.en: 4. knows the content and policies of climate neutrality
5. knows processes related to environmental changes
6. knows the main targets and activities in Estonia to support the Green Deal aims
learning_outcomes.et: 6. teab Roheleppe eesmärkide saavutamiseks vajaminevaid tegevusi Eestis

learning_outcomes.en: 7. understands the relationship between societal resource usage and green economics.
learning_outcomes.et: 7. mõistab ühiskonna ressursikasutuse ja ressursside rohemajanduse omavahelisi seoseid.

notes.et: Some of the guest lectures will be provided via MS Teams.

independent_work.et: Will be provided during the first lecture.

description.et: The presentation of the report should summarize the most important findings provided in the written report. The presenter needs to be able to answer questions regarding the presentation.

Written exam
The exam involves topics covered during the lectures and colloquiums.

Written report
The written report needs to have a logical structure in the scientific report style (title page, table of content, chapters, references, etc.) with necessary graphics and tables.

grade_preconditions.et: A written report needs to be submitted and presented in order to attend the written exam.

grade_evaluation.et: A written report and presentation and a written exam (in Moodle) have to be done for passing the course. Report+presentation = maximum 30 points; Exam = maximum 70 points. The exam has to be taken with a total score of more than 35 points.

debt_elimination.et: Need to discussed with the teaching stuff.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
